function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of dry ice and incense to create high CO2 and PM2.5 concentrations","Impact":"Health risks from exposure to high CO2 and PM2.5 concentrations","Mitigation":"Use of safer alternatives to create high concentrations for testing","Technologies":"Air monitoring sensors to detect high concentrations and ensure safety","People":"Researchers conducting the experiment","Owner":"Research institution or laboratory"},{"Description":"Contamination from unoccupied room with broad IEQ conditions","Impact":"Potential spread of contaminants in the built environment","Mitigation":"Thorough cleaning and disinfection of the room after the experiment","Technologies":"UV-C disinfection systems, air purifiers, and high-efficiency filters","People":"Facility management and cleaning staff","Owner":"Building management or facility owner"},{"Description":"Use of variable refrigerant volume air conditioning system and humidifier for thermal environment control","Impact":"Risk of spreading airborne contaminants through the ventilation system","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance of HVAC system, use of high-efficiency filters, and UV-C disinfection in ventilation ducts","Technologies":"High-efficiency filters and UV-C disinfection systems for HVAC","People":"Building maintenance staff and HVAC technicians","Owner":"Building management or facility owner"}]}
